headline: What Digital Realty Trust (DLR)'s Malaysian Data Center Acquisition Means For Shareholders
summary: In January 2026, Digital Realty Trust confirmed its entry into Malaysia by agreeing to acquire CSF Advisers, owner of the TelcoHub 1 data center in Cyberjaya, and adjacent land that could support up to 14 megawatts of additional capacity, with closing expected in the first half of 2026. The new Malaysian campus will be folded into Digital Realty’s PlatformDIGITAL and equipped with ServiceFabric, potentially deepening interconnectivity and reach across Southeast Asia’s growing data center...
